title: Roadside Oddities
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 281 words, Level I (Grade 1), Lexile 620L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     L and O
description: Do you know where to find the world's largest elephant? Did you know London Bridge was moved to Arizona? Roadside Oddities is an informative book that introduces readers to some weird and wonderful roadside attractions. Detailed photographs support the engaging text filled with entertaining facts. Book and lesson also available at levels L and O.
reviewWords: attractions, model, monument, museum, odd, story
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Initial and Final Blends : Discriminate initial and final consonant st-blends
phonics: Blends : Identify initial and final consonant st-blends
grammar: Comparative Adjectives                : Recognize and use comparative adjectives
